test.name: Manage Cookies

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Button
kw.doc: Verifies button ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.doc: Verifies button ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Button
kw.doc: Verifies button ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
